headline: Bank of America to open more than 150 new branches by 2027
summary: The bank will open 40 new branches this year, with an additional 70 sites planned for 2026, it said.  Banks in the U.S. have continued to focus on their branch networks despite the surging popularity of digital banking, as they facilitate in-person meetings important for fostering customer relationships.  While more than 90% of BofA's client interactions take place through digital platforms, its branches can provide more personalized financial advice, it said.

raw.headline: Bank of America to open more than 150 new branches by 2027

While more than 90% of BofA's client interactions take place through digital platforms, its branches can provide more personalized financial advice, it said.

headline: BofA to Open 150 Financial Centers by 2027, Investing Over $5 Billion in its Network Since 2016
summary: Bank of America will open more than 150 new financial centers across 60 markets by the end of 2027, including 40 this year and an additional 70 in 2026. Since 2016, Bank of America has invested over $5 billion in its financial centers network, opening new locations and renovating existing centers.
